name: Blackout (itch) (electric seal)
description:
Blackout is about slipping into the role of a Transmission System Operator. You are now responsible for keeping the country supplied with electricity and preventing a nationwide blackout. Build new power plants, stay calm in stressful situations and be careful with your resources. This is the only way to be a successful grid operator, so show that you have what it takes.

This game is a mix of puzzle and strategy. You must build and manage a stable and reliable network of power plants to supply electricity to the ever-growing cities. However, you will be confronted with new events in your daily life as a manager. Master these challenges and achieve a new high score.

Note: Energy Production/Consumption Graph might not work in WebGL build when resizing.
